title: 3 and Out - Buying Justin Fields, Belichick Back, Mahomes Struggles, Jordan Love Dud, Stafford Red Flags, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Buying Justin Fields, Belichick Back, Mahomes Struggles, Jordan Love Dud, Stafford Red Flags, Mailbag
description:
John reacts to the Steelers holding off the Bears for a MNF win and explains why he's bullish on Justin Fields. He also explains how Bill Belichick has gotten the Pats back to their winning ways, the red flags he's starting to see with Matt Stafford, why Cardinals GM Steve Keim deserves more credit for the Cardinals turnaround, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag!

Subscribe NOW and make sure you follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates. Check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
